message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $140. I can do $155, and that's as low as I can go.
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to meet you at $145. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
